tagline.title: BALI SWING AND UBUD TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY SWING IN THE JUNGLE AND CONTINUE TO VISIT TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE
tagline.text: BALI SWING AND UBUD TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY SWING IN THE JUNGLE AND CONTINUE TO VISIT TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE
tagline.html: BALI SWING AND UBUD TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY SWING IN THE JUNGLE AND CONTINUE TO VISIT TOURIST DESTINATION IN UBUD VILLAGE

description.text: Bali Swing and Ubud Tour is a combination tour that we make to feel a different sensation from other tours, where you will be able to swing in the forest with amazing views and proceed with visiting attractions in the Ubud area such as rice fields, monkey forest, Ubud palace and market. This tour is very popular with tourists who can feel the sensation of swing and visit attractions in the area of Ubud. In this tour our driver will pick you up at the hotel in the morning and head straight to the Bali swing to enjoy swing activities with amazing views, after finishing swing we will enjoy the lunch provided. After lunch, we will continue our tour to the rice fields in Tegalalang village to enjoy the views of the rice fields and proceed to the Monkey Forest in the center of Ubud, then head to Ubud Palace and visit the Ubud Market. After finishing visiting Ubud market, our driver will drive back to the hotel with a very memorable experience inside the Bali Swing and Ubud Tour.
description.html: Bali Swing and Ubud Tour is a combination tour that we make to feel a different sensation from other tours, where you will be able to swing in the forest with amazing views and proceed with visiting attractions in the Ubud area such as rice fields, monkey forest, Ubud palace and market. This tour is very popular with tourists who can feel the sensation of swing and visit attractions in the area of Ubud. In this tour our driver will pick you up at the hotel in the morning and head straight to the Bali swing to enjoy swing activities with amazing views, after finishing swing we will enjoy the lunch provided. After lunch, we will continue our tour to the rice fields in Tegalalang village to enjoy the views of the rice fields and proceed to the Monkey Forest in the center of Ubud, then head to Ubud Palace and visit the Ubud Market. After finishing visiting Ubud market, our driver will drive back to the hotel with a very memorable experience inside the Bali Swing and Ubud Tour.

title.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Golden Tour

image.title: Bali Swing and Ubud Tour | Bali Swing Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. Swing in Bali is an activity that has just been introduced, but because of the enthusiasm of the tourists who want to try this activity making swing activities famous among domestic and foreign tourists. Enjoy the sensation of swing activity in jungle with amazing view and beautiful scenery

title.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Bali Swing and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Swing and Ubud Tour | Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is tourism object for enjoy the beautiful rice terrace view in Ubud, is popular site for see rice terrace view in ubud village, and sometimes here you can see farmers working in the fields. Ubud Tegalalang Rice Terrace is one of the tourist icon in Ubud Bali. The Ubud rice terrace is designed very beautiful with exquisite hollowing rice field and precisely located on the hill bank. In this place, you will see the Balinese farmer do their rice field in oblique area complete with its system irrigation.

button.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Bali Swing and Ubud Tour

title.title: Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Swing and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Swing and Ubud Tour | Bali Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Monkey Forest is a small rain forest dwelt by some group of monkeys and other tropical animals. Their scientific name is macaca fascicularis and aside from humans, macaques are the most widespread and successful of all primates. It is strategically located in the hearth of Ubud Village. Monkey Forests in Balinese language called Wanara Wana are spread out in the island and Ubud Monkey Forest itself own very important function of the continuity the monkey habitat in Bali.

title.title: Ubud Royal Palace | Bali Swing and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Swing and Ubud Tour | Bali Ubud Royal Palace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Royal Palace is a Ubud Kingdom Palace with wonderful Balinese customary houses as a living arrangement of Ubud King. It is set in the center of Ubud Bali with traditional art market just in front of it and it is found by Ida Tjokorda Putu Kandel who has commanded from year 1800 - 1823. The presence of Puri Saren as a royal residence is prepared by a Wantilan/assembly room that is an extensive working of meeting room and a banyan tree as haven spot at the daytime. Ubud town has been popular place to visit.
description.html: Ubud Royal Palace is a Ubud Kingdom Palace with wonderful Balinese customary houses as a living arrangement of Ubud King. title.title: Ubud Market | Bali Swing and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Swing and Ubud Tour | Bali Ubud Market | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud Market is a traditional art market in the center of Ubud village, where the existence is not far different from other markets available in the tourism area. Ubud market as an economic center in the village of Ubud, where here sells all the necessities of life for local people and here there are two market buildings, buildings for local people who sell necessities and buildings for tourists who sell all handicrafts and souvenirs for foreign and domestic tourists. if you want to buy souvenirs, here is the place because there are many shops that sell various kinds of handicrafts and souvenirs

price.title: Bali Swing and Ubud Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Swing and Ubud Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,400,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 800,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 750,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 700,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Swing and Ubud Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol and Parking Fee
  • Swing at Bali Swing
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Entrance Ticket at Tourism Site
  • Insurance Coverage during Bali Swing
  • Mineral Water

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
